nodes.text: Narro Sienar was the father of Raith Sienar and CEO of Santhe/Sienar Technologies. Despite being the owner of one of the Corellian Engineering Corporation's primary competitors, Sienar helped the Corporation design the successful YT-1300 light freighter. In 38 BBY, he died when his starship was destroyed near Dantooine by a bomb planted by the Xi Char, in an attempt on his son's life.[source?]
